column2: when I called in to make a reservation for two (birthday date)
column3: I was told they don't take reservations for the social hour. Sure enough
column5: we were told all but one table was reserved (that last table was just taken by a group in front of us). I.e. whoever answered for reservations lied about not taking reservations (call was placed 4/30 at around 6pm the night b4)
column6: while there were obviously still tables available to reserve when I called.
